titles.title: To amend to exempt the Medicare program from fallback sequestration under the Budget Control Act of 2011.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary: 11/29/2011--Introduced. Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act), as amended by the Budget Control Act of 2011, to exempt specified programs under title XVIII (Medicare ) of the Social Security Act from fall back sequestration. Prohibits any direct spending reductions for such programs.
